body.p: 1. Alternate name for Jachin, Simeon’s son, in 1 Chronicles 4:24. See Jachin #1.
2. Man who assisted Ezra in securing temple servants before the return to Palestine from exile (Ezr 8:16).
3. From Jeshua’s family, a priest who obeyed Ezra’s exhortation to divorce his pagan wife after the exile (Ezr 10:18).
